name: Mobile Bomb Squad
description:
"This game is magnificent!" (Mark13673)

"Well designed and creative" (Dark Bloodbane)

"Very nice and polished game." (hcs89)

"This game is absolutely wonderful, and a joy to play!" (Shadow Link)

"I love it I love it I love it." (Pinpickle)

This is a puzzle-game with a twist: Create chain reactions of explosions by putting bombs and rockets in the right places.

Features:
-    Six environments
-    Animated intro
-    Support of different profiles with different settings
-    Several types of enemies
-    Numerous interactive elements
-    Hidden bonuses
-    Two different endings
